--- layout: compress --- Catherine Zeng | UX Design and Product Design

Hello!

I'm Catherine Zeng, a UX designer & Product Designer focused on delivering mindful experiences, products, and services to educate, entertain, and inspire users.

Get in touch yilinz213@gmail.com

Background

I'm currently an undergraduate student at the University of Washington obtaining my Bachelor of Science degree in Human Centered Design and Engineering and a minor in Informatics.

I am a UX Designer and Product Designer, but I am as well an archeologist, ecologist, psychologist, and epistemologist. Through leveraging the potentials of human-computer interaction, I bridge the gap between people and technology and extend the technology experiences into people’s everyday life.

When I'm not brain dumping creative thoughts on paper or computer screens, I'm probably playing my cello, going outdoor for walks, travelling, hitting tennis, or watching comedies.
